bibliographic-data.invention-title: Staged transactions systems and methods

abstract.p: Systems and methods for accepting payments for goods and services provided by a merchant. In one embodiment, a method for accepting payments from a consumer for a good or service provided by a merchant comprises receiving a transaction request from the merchant, receiving a payment from the consumer, associating the payment with the transaction request, and sending at least a portion of the payment to the merchant. In this manner, the merchant stages the transaction, and the consumer completes the transaction by making the payment. An optional time limit feature also may be used, and the transaction may be staged by the consumer, or others.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Payment service method and system
ELECTRONIC IDENTIFIER PAYMENT SYSTEM AND METHODS
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE PAIEMENT ELECTRONIQUE AVEC IDENTIFICATEUR

abstract.p: Systems and methods for accepting payments for goods and services provided b y a consumer provider. The methods can include associating consumers and consumer providers with a payment provider (130). The payment provider (130) can receive payments destined for the consumer provider (140a) (140b) (140c) , associate the payments with one or more identifiers, and transfer at least portions of the receive payments to the consumer provider (140a) (140b) (140c). The systems can include a point-of-sale device configured to accept payments from consumers on behalf of consumer providers (140a) (140b) (140c) . In some cases, the systems include a plurality of such point-of-sale devices in communication (120) with a payment provider control (130). The payment provider control (130) can be in communication (120) with one or more consum er provider controls (140a) (140b) (140c).

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ACCEPTING TRAVEL RELATED PAYMENTS FROM CONSUMER
SYSTEME ET PROCEDES DE RESERVATION ET DE PAIEMENT DE BILLETSD'AVION

abstract.p: A method for accepting payments from a consumer for travel tickets from a travel company comprises receiving at a point of sale device (1018) a transaction request that includes a transaction identifier that identifies a travel arrangement made with the travel company and a payment amount. The payment amount and transaction identifier is transmitted to a host computer (1016) for validation. To make a reservation, a consumer may contact reservation system (1010) using phone (1014) or computer (1012).

Electronic identifier payment system and methods

abstract.p: A payment service method and system involve a payment service provider, a customer/payor and a consumer provider/payee. The customer/payor enrolls in the service and is provided a unique identifier that enables the customer to conduct transactions with the payment service provider. The customer/payor interfaces with the payment service provider through various forms of communication, and can facilitate payments to the consumer providers/payees through the payment service provider while remaining anonymous.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Systems and methods for enrolling consumers in goods and services

abstract.p: Systems and methods for enrolling consumers in goods and services offered by a consumer provider are disclosed herein. Various of the methods include providing an enrollment system and displaying enrollment options via the enrollment system. Further, the methods include receiving enrollment requests and enrolling a consumer based on the enrollment request. The systems can be configured for effectuating the various enrollment methods.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Systems and methods for staging transactions, payments and collections

abstract.p: The present invention relates to systems and methods for staging transactions and facilitating payments by consumers to a lender or merchant to consummate a financial transaction and/or to maintain a financial relationship. In one embodiment, a method for accepting payments from a consumer includes receiving a promise-to-pay record from a lender (210), receiving a payment from the consumer (220), associating the payment with the promise-to-pay record (230), and sending a notice to the lender (240), with the notice having an indicator that the payment has been received.

In one embodiment, a method for accepting payments from a consumer includes receiving a promise-to-pay record from a lender ( 210 ), receiving a payment from the consumer ( 220 ), associating the payment with the promise-to-pay record ( 230 ), and sending a notice to the lender ( 240 ), with the notice having an indicator that the payment has been received.

abstract.p: Systems and methods for accepting payments for goods and services provided by a consumer provider. The methods can include associating consumers and consumer providers with a payment provider. The payment provider can receive payments destined for the consumer provider, associate the payments with one or more identifiers, and transfer at least portions of the receive payments to the consumer provider. The systems can include a point-of-sale device configured to accept payments from consumers on behalf of consumer providers. In some cases, the systems include a plurality of such point-of-sale devices in communication with a payment provider control. The payment provider control can be in communication with one or more consumer provider controls.

abstract.p: Systems and methods for accepting payments for goods and services provided by a consumer provider. The methods can include associating consumers and consumer providers with a payment provider. The payment provider can receive payments destined for the consumer provider, associate the payments with one or more identifiers, and transfer at least portions of the receive payments to the consumer provider. The systems can include a point-of-sale device configured to accept payments from consumers on behalf of consumer providers. In some cases, the systems include a plurality of such point-of-sale devices in communication with a payment provider control. The payment provider control can be in communication with one or more consumer provider controls.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Airline ticket payment and reservation system and methods

abstract.p: A method for accepting payments from a consumer for a travel ticket from a travel company comprises receiving at a point of sale device a transaction request that includes a transaction identifier that identifies a travel arrangement made with the travel company and a payment amount. The payment amount and the transaction identifier is transmitted to a host computer system for validation. Also, a validation from the host computer system is received indicating that the transaction requested has been validated. A payment is received from the consumer, and at least a portion of the payment is electronically transmitted to the travel company.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Airline ticket payment and reservation system and methods

The payment amount and the transaction identifier is transmitted to a host computer system for validation. Also, a validation from the host computer system is received indicating that the transaction requested has been validated. bibliographic-data.invention-title: Electronic identifier payment system and methods

abstract.p: A payment service method and system involve a payment service provider, a customer/payor and a consumer provider/payee. The customer/payor enrolls in the service and is provided a unique identifier that enables the customer to conduct transactions with the payment service provider. The customer/payor interfaces with the payment service provider through various forms of communication, and can facilitate payments to the consumer providers/payees through the payment service provider while remaining anonymous.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Electronic identifier payment systems and methods

abstract.p: A payment service method and system involve a payment service provider, a customer/payor and a consumer provider/payee. The customer/payor enrolls in the service and is provided a unique identifier that enables the customer to conduct transactions with the payment service provider. The customer/payor interfaces with the payment service provider through various forms of communication, and can facilitate payments to the consumer providers/payees through the payment service provider while remaining anonymous.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Payment service method and system

abstract.p: A payment service method and system involve a payment service provider, a customer/payor and a client/payee. The customer/payor enrolls in the service and is provided the unique identifier which enables him or her to conduct all transactions with the payment service provider. The customer/payor interfaces with the payment service provider through various forms of communication, and can facilitate payments to the clients/payees through the payment service provider while remaining anonymous. Various enhancements are provided for promoting the services of the clients and the payment service provider to customer bases obtained from persons enrolled in the payment service and from persons who are customers of the clients.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Payment service method and system

abstract.p: A payment service method and system involve a payment service provider, a customer/payor and a client/payee. The customer/payor enrolls in the service and is provided the unique identifier which enables him or her to conduct all transactions with the payment service provider. The customer/payor interfaces with the payment service provider through various forms of communication, and can facilitate payments to the clients/payees through the payment service provider while remaining anonymous. Various enhancements are provided for promoting the services of the clients and the payment service provider to customer bases obtained from persons enrolled in the payment service and from persons who are customers of the clients.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Staged transactions systems and methods

abstract.p: Systems and methods for accepting payments for goods and services provided by a merchant. In one embodiment, a method for accepting payments from a consumer for a good or service provided by a merchant comprises receiving a transaction request from the merchant, receiving a payment from the consumer, associating the payment with the transaction request, and sending at least a portion of the payment to the merchant. In this manner, the merchant stages the transaction, and the consumer completes the transaction by making the payment. An optional time limit feature also may be used, and the transaction may be staged by the consumer, or others.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Staged transactions systems and methods

abstract.p: A payment service method and system involve a payment service provider, a customer/payor and a consumer provider/payee. The customer/payor enrolls in the service and is provided a unique identifier that enables the customer to conduct transactions with the payment service provider. The customer/payor interfaces with the payment service provider through various forms of communication, and can facilitate payments to the consumer providers/payees through the payment service provider while remaining anonymous.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR STAGING TRANSACTIONS, PAYMENTS AND COLLECTIONS

abstract.p: The present invention relates to systems and methods for staging transactions and facilitating payments by consumers to a lender or merchant to consummate a financial transaction and/or to maintain a financial relationship. In one embodiment, a method for accepting payments from a consumer includes receiving a promise-to-pay record from a lender ( 210 ), receiving a payment from the consumer ( 220 ), associating the payment with the promise-to-pay record ( 230 ), and sending a notice to the lender ( 240 ), with the notice having an indicator that the payment has been received.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR STAGING TRANSACTIONS, PAYMENTS AND COLLECTIONS

abstract.p: The present invention relates to systems and methods for staging transactions and facilitating payments by consumers to a lender or merchant to consummate a financial transaction and/or to maintain a financial relationship. In one embodiment, a method for accepting payments from a consumer includes receiving a promise-to-pay record from a lender (210), receiving a payment from the consumer (220), associating the payment with the promise-to-pay record (230), and sending a notice to the lender (240), with the notice having an indicator that the payment has been received.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: AIRLINE TICKET PAYMENT AND RESERVATION SYSTEM AND METHODS

abstract.p: A method for accepting payments from a consumer for a travel ticket from a travel company comprises receiving at a point of sale device a transaction request that includes a transaction identifier that identifies a travel arrangement made with the travel company and a payment amount. The payment amount and the transaction identifier is transmitted to a host computer system for validation. Also, a validation from the host computer system is received indicating that the transaction requested has been validated. A payment is received from the consumer, and at least a portion of the payment is electronically transmitted to the travel company.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: AIRLINE TICKET PAYMENT AND RESERVATION SYSTEM AND METHODS

abstract.p: Systems and methods for enrolling consumers in goods and services offered by a consumer provider are disclosed herein. Various of the methods include providing an enrollment system and displaying enrollment options via the enrollment system. Further, the methods include receiving enrollment requests and enrolling a consumer based on the enrollment request. The systems can be configured for effectuating the various enrollment methods.

abstract.p: Systems and methods for enrolling consumers in goods and services offered by a consumer provider are disclosed herein. Various of the methods include providing an enrollment system and displaying enrollment options via the enrollment system. Further, the methods include receiving enrollment requests and enrolling a consumer based on the enrollment request. The systems can be configured for effectuating the various enrollment methods.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Electronic identifier payment systems and methods

abstract.p: Systems and methods for accepting payments for goods and services provided by a consumer provider. The methods can include associating consumers and consumer providers with a payment provider. The payment provider can receive payments destined for the consumer provider, associate the payments with one or more identifiers, and transfer at least portions of the receive payments to the consumer provider. The systems can include a point-of-sale device configured to accept payments from consumers on behalf of consumer providers. In some cases, the systems include a plurality of such point-of-sale devices in communication with a payment provider control. The payment provider control can be in communication with one or more consumer provider controls.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Payment service method and system

abstract.p: A payment service method and system involve a payment service provider, a customer/payor and a client/payee. The customer/payor enrolls in the service and is provided the unique identifier which enables him or her to conduct all transactions with the payment service provider. The customer/payor interfaces with the payment service provider through various forms of communication, and can facilitate payments to the clients/payees through the payment service provider while remaining anonymous. Various enhancements are provided for promoting the services of the clients and the payment service provider to customer bases obtained from persons enrolled in the payment service and from persons who are customers of the clients.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: PAYMENT SERVICE METHOD AND SYSTEM
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE SERVICE DE PAIEMENT

abstract.p: A payment service method and system (2) involve a payment service provider (4), a customer/payor (6) and a client/payee (8). The customer/payor (6) enrolls in the service and is provided the unique identifier (10) which enables him or her to conduct all transactions with the payment service provider. The customer/payor (6) interfaces with the payment service provider (4) through various forms of communication, and can facilitate payments to the clients/payees (8) through the payment service provider (4) while remaining anonymous. Various enhancements are provided for promoting the services of the clients (8) and the payment service provider (4) to customer bases (18) obtained from persons enrolled in the payment service and from persons who are customers (6) of the clients (8).

La présente invention concerne un procédé et un système (2) de service de paiement impliquant un fournisseur (4) de services de paiement, un acheteur/payeur (6) et un client/bénéficiaire (8). L'acheteur(acheteuse)/ payeur(payeuse) (6) s'inscrit au service et se voit attribuer l'identificateur unique (10) qui lui permet d'effectuer toutes les transactions avec le fournisseur de service de paiement. L'acheteur/payeur (6) interface avec le fournisseur (4) de service de paiement à travers diverses formes de communication, et peut faciliter les paiements aux clients/payeurs (8) par l'intermédiaire du fournisseur (4) de service de paiement tout en restant anonyme.

L'invention concerne diverses améliorations permettant de favoriser les services des clients (8) et le fournisseur (4) de service de paiement à des bases d'acheteurs (18) obtenues à partir de personnes inscrites dans le service de paiement et à partir de personnes qui sont des acheteurs (6) des clients (8).

bibliographic-data.invention-title: PAYMENT SERVICE METHOD AND SYSTEM
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE SERVICE DE PAIEMENT

abstract.p: A payment service method and system (2) involve a payment service provider (4), a customer/payor (6) and a client/payee (8). The customer/payor (6) enrolls in the service and is provided the unique identifier (10) which enables him or her to conduct all transactions with the payment service provider. The customer/payor (6) interfaces with the payment service provider (4) through various forms of communication, and can facilitate payments to the clients/payees (8) through the payment service provider (4) while remaining anonymous. Various enhancements are provided for promoting the services of the clients (8) and the payment service provider (4) to customer bases (18) obtained from persons enrolled in the payment service and from persons who are customers (6) of the clients (8).

La présente invention concerne un procédé et un système (2) de service de paiement impliquant un fournisseur (4) de services de paiement, un acheteur/payeur (6) et un client/bénéficiaire (8). L'acheteur(acheteuse)/ payeur(payeuse) (6) s'inscrit au service et se voit attribuer l'identificateur unique (10) qui lui permet d'effectuer toutes les transactions avec le fournisseur de service de paiement. L'acheteur/payeur (6) interface avec le fournisseur (4) de service de paiement à travers diverses formes de communication, et peut faciliter les paiements aux clients/payeurs (8) par l'intermédiaire du fournisseur (4) de service de paiement tout en restant anonyme.

L'invention concerne diverses améliorations permettant de favoriser les services des clients (8) et le fournisseur (4) de service de paiement à des bases d'acheteurs (18) obtenues à partir de personnes inscrites dans le service de paiement et à partir de personnes qui sont des acheteurs (6) des clients (8).

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ELECTRONIC IDENTIFIER PAYMENT SYSTEM AND METHODS
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE PAIEMENT ELECTRONIQUE AVEC IDENTIFICATEUR

abstract.p: [133] Systems and methods for accepting payments for goods and services provided by a consumer provider. The methods can include associating consumers and consumer providers with a payment provider. The payment provider can receive payments destined for the consumer provider, associate the payments with one or more identifiers, and transfer at least portions of the receive payments to the consumer provider. The systems can include a point-of-sale device configured to accept payments from consumers on behalf of consumer providers. In some cases, the systems include a plurality of such point-of-sale devices in communication with a payment provider control. The payment provider control can be in communication with one or more consumer provider controls.

Systems and methods for accepting payments for goods and services provided by a consumer provider. The methods can include associating consumers and consumer providers with a payment provider 130. The payment provider 130 can receive payments destined for the consumer provider 140a 140b 140c, associate the payments with one or more identifiers, and transfer at least portions of the receive payments to the consumer provider 140a 140b 140c. The systems can include a point-of-sale device configured to accept payments from consumers on behalf of consumer providers 140a 140b 140c. In some cases, the systems include a plurality of such point-of-sale devices in communication 120 with a payment provider control 130. The payment provider control 130 can be in communication 120 with one or more consumer provider controls 140a 140b 140c.

L'invention concerne des systèmes et des procédés permettant l'acceptation d'un paiement versé pour l'achat de biens et de services fournis par un fournisseur de produits de consommation. Ce procédé permet d'associer les consommateurs et les fournisseurs de produits de consommations à un fournisseur de paiement. Le fournisseur de paiement peut recevoir les paiements destinés au fournisseur de produits de consommation, associer ces paiements à un ou à plusieurs identificateurs, et transférer au moins en partie les paiements reçus au fournisseur de produits de consommation. Ces systèmes peuvent comprendre un dispositif point de vente conçu pour accepter des paiements des consommateurs effectués pour le compte de fournisseurs de produits.

Dans certaines versions, ces systèmes comprennent une pluralité de dispositifs point de vente de ce type, qui communiquent avec une unité de commande du fournisseur de paiement. Le fournisseur de paiement peut communiquer avec une ou plusieurs unités de commande du fournisseur de produits.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: AIRLINE TICKET PAYMENT AND RESERVATION SYSTEM AND METHODS
SYSTEME ET PROCEDES DE RESERVATION ET DE PAIEMENT DE BILLETS D'AVION

abstract.p: A method for accepting payments from a consumer for a travel ticket from a travel company comprises receiving at a point of sale device a transaction request that includes a transaction identifier that identifies a travel arrangement made with the travel company and a payment amount. The payment amount and the transaction identifier is transmitted to a host computer system for validation. Also, a validation from the host computer system is received indicating that the transaction requested has been validated. A payment is received from the consumer, and at least a portion of the payment is electronically transmitted to the travel company.

L'invention concerne un procédé d'acceptation de paiements d'un client par une agence voyage. Ledit procédé consiste à recevoir au niveau d'un dispositif point de vente une demande de transaction qui comprend un identifiant de transaction qui identifie la réservation de voyage passée avec une agence de voyages et un montant de paiement. L'identifiant de transaction et de montant de paiement est transmis à un système informatique hôte pour être validé. Ainsi, une validation provenant du système informatique hôte est reçue, laquelle indique que la transaction demandée a été validée. Un paiement est reçu en provenance du client et au moins une partie du paiement est transmis électroniquement à l'agence de voyages.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ACCEPTING TRAVEL RELATED PAYMENTS FROM CONSUMER
SYSTEME ET PROCEDES DE RESERVATION ET DE PAIEMENT DE BILLETS D'AVION

abstract.p: A method for accepting payments from a consumer for travel tickets from a travel company comprises receiving at a point of sale device (1018) a transaction request that includes a transaction identifier that identifies a travel arrangement made with the travel company and a payment amount. The payment amount and transaction identifier is transmitted to a host computer (1016) for validation. To make a reservation, a consumer may contact reservation system (1010) using phone (1014) or computer (1012).

L'invention concerne un procédé d'acceptation de paiements d'un client par une agence voyage. Ledit procédé consiste à recevoir au niveau d'un dispositif point de vente une demande de transaction qui comprend un identifiant de transaction qui identifie la réservation de voyage passée avec une agence de voyages et un montant de paiement. L'identifiant de transaction et de montant de paiement est transmis à un système informatique hôte pour être validé. Ainsi, une validation provenant du système informatique hôte est reçue, laquelle indique que la transaction demandée a été validée. Un paiement est reçu en provenance du client et au moins une partie du paiement est transmis électroniquement à l'agence de voyages.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR STAGING TRANSACTIONS, PAYMENTS AND COLLECTIONS
SYSTEMES ET PROCEDES PERMETTANT D'ORGANISER DES TRANSACTIONS, DES PAIEMENTS ET DES RECUEILS

nplcit.text: PIUMELLI F.A., SCHMIDT D.A.: 'Power Collecting, Automation for Effective Asset Management.', 1998, ISBN 0471180432 pages 209 - 230, XP002985288

abstract.p: The present invention relates to systems and methods for staging transactions and facilitating payments by consumers to a lender or merchant to consummate a financial transaction and/or to maintain a financial relationship. In one embodiment, a method for accepting payments from a consumer includes receiving a promise-to-pay record from a lender (210), receiving a payment from the consumer (220), associating the payment with the promise-to-pay record (230), and sending a notice to the lender (240), with the notice having an indicator that the payment has been received.

L'invention concerne des systèmes et des procédés permettant d'organiser des transactions et de faciliter des paiements par des clients à un bailleur de fonds ou un commerçant, de manière à achever une transaction financière et/ou à conserver une relation financière. Dans un mode de réalisation, un procédé permettant d'accepter des paiements d'un client consiste à recevoir un rapport de promesse de paiement d'un bailleur de fonds (210), à recevoir un paiement du client (220), à associer le paiement au rapport de promesse de paiement (230) et à envoyer un avis au bailleur de fonds (240), lequel comprend une indication selon laquelle le paiement a été reçu.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR STAGING TRANSACTIONS, PAYMENTS AND COLLECTIONS
SYSTÈMES ET PROCÉDÉS POUR ORGANISER DES TRANSACTIONS, DES PAIEMENTS, ET DES ENCAISSEMENTS

abstract.p: The present invention relates to systems and methods for staging transactions and facilitating payments by consumers to a lender or merchant to consummate a financial transaction and/or to maintain a financial relationship. In one embodiment, a method for accepting payments from a consumer includes receiving a promise-to-pay record from a lender (210), receiving a payment from the consumer (220), associating the payment with the promise-to-pay record (230), and sending a notice to the lender (240), with the notice having an indicator that the payment has been received.

La présente invention porte sur des systèmes et des procédés pour organiser des transactions et faciliter des paiements par des clients à un prêteur ou à un vendeur pour accomplir une transaction financière et/ou maintenir une relation financière. Dans un mode de réalisation, un procédé pour accepter les paiements d'un client comprend la réception de l'enregistrement de la promesse de payer d'un prêteur (210), la réception d'un paiement du client (220), l'association de paiement avec l'enregistrement de la promesse de payer (230) et l'envoi d'une notification au prêteur (240), la notification ayant un indicateur selon lequel le paiement a été reçu.
